text: The Billboard Latin Pop Songs is a chart that ranks the best-performing Spanish-language Pop music singles of the United States. Published by Billboard magazine, the data are compiled by Nielsen SoundScan based collectively on each single's weekly airplay. ==Chart history== {| class="wikitable" !Issue date !Song !Artist(s)
